comment: lots of quizzes and labs. very dependent on lockdown browser. takes points off if environment check is not done a certain way or isnt in depth enough.
Not a bad class. Would take again
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: He is a great teacher. Very structured with his work and sends out at least 3 emails a week keeping people up to date on what they should be working on that week. If you do the work you will pass easily! Quizzes and labs are open book and the 3 exams are lockdown. I love his work ethic, its easy if you do the work
A quiz and lab every week that isn't tough to do. Also, tests are on lockdown browser, but they're replicas of the study guide which is just lecture notes. Easy class

Quizzes are straightforward and pretty easy if you read the PowerPoints. Labs are time-consuming and can be challenging at times but nothing too crazy. Exams require a webcam but if you study you should be ok.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Lecture heavy

comment: Dr. Gilliland is highly respectable and treats students with respect. He teaches with integrity and is extremely knowledgable in his field. Responds to questions quickly and does not make you feel dumb for asking them.

He was very kind and helped me outside of his office hours (accommodating to my work schedule). There is homework every week, a discussion, and a quiz, but as long as you read the assigned readings and follow the protocols, it is an easy class!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Tough grader

comment: This teacher is very serious, but I had him online so it didn't really matter. The coursework itself was very simple. One quiz and lab due every week. Three exams, that's it! Truly an easy course, he also gives study guides that are EXACT to the exams!!! Just know the answers and do the work, you'll be just fine!

Not only is this class mostly tests and quizzes which makes missing or failing one mean you will not get an A. When my family member passed and i had to miss a test, he asked for proof... i dont care if thats a norm for professors its disgusting to ask someone in grieving for proof their family member passed. How inconsiderate and insensitive.

This course for me wasn't difficult. I had a 4-week class so every week I had two labs and two quizzes. The labs are interactive and easy and the quizzes were not very hard. He had great powerpoints which were very helpful. And I had two test worth a lot, but the test were not hard as long as you looked over the powerpoints. I hightly recommend.

12 quizzes and labs for each non-test week, lowest 2 of each dropped. 3 tests with lockdown browser and webcam and worth 20% so doing poorly on one will ruin your chances of an A. Good thing is test material is all in the lecture PPTs and he provides study guides for each test and gives you a week of no assignments to study for, study well  A

This class is SO easy. It is graded by multiple labs, quizzes, and 3 tests, however, the labs and quizzes are the ONLY homework each week and they take maybe an hour and a half to finish and they are so easy. The tests are lockdown browser and webcam but it just challenges you to actually study. Study the study guides and you'll be fine!
Literally he made this class so difficult, way more than it needed to be. He also is very strict about not only lock down browser, but also webcams. Beware THIS IS NOT AN EASY CLASS.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: The class is extremely interesting if you like science and nature. Every week there's a powerpoint presentation of the lesson with a quiz and lab. Honestly, if you don't take notes from the powerpoints or read the book, you won't pass. However, I wouldn't buy the book because everything in the powerpoints is from the book.
